Class RepTrackerEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.events.BaseEventPlugin
      • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.events.RepTrackerEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CampaignEventListener, CampaignEventPlugin, CallEvent.CallableEvent

    public class RepTrackerEvent
extends BaseEventPlugin
    Trade, time-based rep decay, rep from combat w/ enemies of faction fought against.
    Author:
    Alex Mosolov Copyright 2014 Fractal Softworks, LLC
